mapper.select: Select a.ID, -- 아이디 a.TYPE, -- 타입 a.TITLE, -- 제목 a.AUTHOR_NAME, -- 작성자 a.CREATED_AT, -- 작성일시 a.VIEWS, -- 조회수 a.CONTENT -- 내용 FROM POSTS a Where 1 = 1 And a.TYPE = 'EVENT' And a.ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: Insert Into POSTS ( TYPE, TITLE, CONTENT, AUTHOR_NAME, VIEWS, IS_ACTIVE, EVENT_END_DATE ) Values ( 'EVENT', #{title}, #{content}, #{authorName}, 0, #{isActive}, #{eventEndDate} )
mapper.update:
Update POSTS
TITLE = #{title},
CONTENT = #{content},
EVENT_END_DATE = #{eventEndDate},
UPDATED_AT = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
Where 1 = 1 And TYPE = 'EVENT' And ID = #{id}
mapper.delete: Delete From POSTS Where 1 = 1 And TYPE = 'EVENT' And ID = #{id}
